title: Customized Science Microlearning Design: Short-Intensive Course for Corporate Employees

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced knowledge in scientific fields and experience applying it to work
context.additional_context: Time-efficient mobile-based learning requiring consideration of individual work characteristics

learning_goals: Learners will be able to accurately explain five core scientific concepts in a mobile environment within one week with at least 80% accuracy.
Learners will be able to propose at least three scientific problem-solving strategies through the analysis of workplace application cases.
Learners will complete at least 90% of optimized microlearning content based on their personalized learning profiles.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
